survey_name: Gym Member Satisfaction and Facility Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from gym members regarding their satisfaction with facilities, equipment, and services to improve overall member experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the gym per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all likely frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the gym per week?

questions.question_text: Which of the following gym facilities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include all major facility areas.

script.question_text: Which of the following gym facilities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the gym facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the gym facilities?

questions.question_text: What additional equipment or facilities would you like to see added to the gym?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional equipment or facilities would you like to see added to the gym?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this gym to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for likelihood measurement. This is a key metric for Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this gym to a friend or colleague?
